title: dEvi shree
sahitya:
dEvI shrI mahAlakSmi dInapAlE rakSisenna



anupallavi



 bhAva bhaktiyinda ninna bhajanegaiva bhAgyavittu



caraNam

 aSTAdasha nija bhujE amita dayA shAlini duSTAsuramardhini surava paripAlini

 shiSTA jiSTArtadE divya ratna bhUSaNi aSTAngani vandisuvE harikEshapura vAsini
